title: May 7, 2025
textContent:
---Happy 14th motmot!---

Halu bby! Kakatapos ko lang work and I'm writing this right now para kagising mo mabasa mo agad sa website hehehe Ababayu!

Happy 14 monthsary! Lahat ata ng letters ko this month, about sa hobbies naten HAHAHAHAH Sana wag ka magsawa! HUHUHU I love you so much! Sinabi ko naman sayo dati diba, I'll learn all things about you, and love them all, tapos pag naubusan nako ng things to learn, we'll find new things to love about each other together! Whether it be new hobbies, bagong hairstyle, bagong life goals, bagong dreams, ket ano pa! I'll weather life with you, face our problems together, and love you forever!

Happy monthsary my bby! I'm so glad I'll get to grow old with you! I love you so much! MWAAAA
